text: Eric Ken Shinseki (born November 28, 1942) is a retired United States Army four-star general who was serving as the 7th United States Secretary of Veterans Affairs. His last U.S. Army position was as the 34th Chief of Staff of the Army (1999-2003). Eric Ken Shinseki served in obamas cabinet for veterans affairs for 5 years and 130 days == References == Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Veterans Affairs Category:Military people from Hawaii Category:Politicians from Hawaii Category:Purple Heart recipients Category:American generals
title: Eric Shinseki
